Summary Note:
Dekkers Terpstra and the RM met at a financial seminar in Amsterdam. They attended several workshops together and exchanged ideas on market trends, which sparked a long-term professional relationship.
Dekkers Terpstra is a 58 year old Tech Industry Leader from Netherlands.
He was drawn to Julius Baer's holistic financial planning and investment strategies, prompting the decision to join.
Family Background: Dekkers Terpstra has been happily married to Isabelle since 1992. Dekkers and Isabelle have 3 children, named Spaans, Isa and Van Dijk.
Education Background:
Dekkers obtained his secondary school diploma from Het Rijnlands Lyceum Oegstgeest in 1986.
Dekkers pursued higher education at Koninklijk Nederlands Meteorologisch Instituut (KNMI), graduating in 1990.
Occupation History:
With a career spanning nearly 34 years, Dekkers Terpstra has established himself as a key player in the industry.
Dekkers Terpstra launched his career as a Software Developer at TomTom N.V., where he gained valuable experience from 1991 to 1995.
In 1995, he moved to ASML Holding N.V. to work as a Startup Founder, applying his knowledge to achieve outstanding performance.
From 2000 to 2005, he served as a CEO at Takeaway.com N.V., solidifying his position as a leader in the industry.
He appointment as a Venture Capitalist at TomTom N.V. in 2007 marked a significant milestone in his career, as he took on increasingly complex challenges and delivered exceptional results.
Since joining Takeaway.com N.V. as a Tech Industry Leader in 2011, he has established himself as a respected authority, fostering collaboration and pushing boundaries to achieve groundbreaking results.
Wealth Summary:
While working, he saved 1260000 EUR, which he used to build a diversified investment portfolio.
He has villa located in Tilburg, worth 2010000 EUR.


Following the passing of his grandmother, a successful Venture Capitalist, he received an inheritance of 7630000 EUR in 2013, which he has used to secure his financial future.
Client Summary: In summary, Dekkers has demonstrated a strong work ethic and financial acumen, positioning them well for the future.
